The uncorrected correct distance visual acuity assess use 100 % contrast Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study chart , uncorrected intermediate visual acuity 70 cm , uncorrected near visual acuity 40 cm ; binocular defocus curve construct use ETDRS chart 4 add patient 's manifest refraction +2.50 -5.00 D sphere 0.50 increment .
